Package orm

Class ORM

java.lang.Object
orm.ORM
public class ORM extends Object
ORM provides the interface for orm-functionality

    • setCache

      public static void setCache(ICache cache)
      Sets a new Cache for the ORM class
      Parameters:
      cache - this parameter will be the new cache. this parameter cannot be null.

      Throws:
      SQLException

      This method saves an Object to the Database
      Parameters:
      o - The object that will be saved.
      Throws:
      InvocationTargetException

      SQLException

    • save

      protected static <T> void save(Class<T> t, Object o) throws SQLException, InvocationTargetException, IllegalAccessException
      This method saves the Object to the corresponding class. Is mainly used to save the parentclass of an object, as table per type is used.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the generic type of the class
      Parameters:
      t - the Class object, which holds the class of the object
      o - the object to be saved
      Throws:
      SQLException
      InvocationTargetException
      IllegalAccessException

    • saveExternals

      protected static void saveExternals(Object o, Collection<Object> list, _Field field) throws SQLException, InvocationTargetException, IllegalAccessException
      This method saves oneToMany and ManyToMany relationships
      Parameters:
      o - the object, which holds the
      list - a collection with the external relationships
      field - the metafield of the external relationship
      Throws:
      SQLException
      InvocationTargetException
      IllegalAccessException

    • createObject

      protected static <T> Object createObject(Class<T> c, Object pk)
      executes a select query using the primary key and creates an object from the selected data
      Type Parameters:
      T - the generic type for the object.
      Parameters:
      c - the class of the object, that will be returned.
      pk - the primary key of the object.
      Returns:
      returns the requested object from the database or null if it not exists

    • get

      public static <T> T get(Class<T> c, Object pk)
      Selects a record from the database and creates an object from the data.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the generic type of the returned object.
      Parameters:
      c - the class of the object, that will be returned.
      pk - the primary key of the object.
      Returns:
      the requested object from the database.

    • delete

      public static void delete(Object o) throws SQLException, InvocationTargetException, IllegalAccessException
      Deletes the object from the database.
      Parameters:
      o - the object, that will be deleted.
      Throws:
      SQLException
      InvocationTargetException
      IllegalAccessException

    • query

      public static QueryObject query(String command) throws SQLException
      Creates a new Query object with the given sql command. The query can be executed with the execute method, if there is no return value, executeQueryMany if there should be many return values and executeQueryOne, if there should be only one return value
      Parameters:
      command - the sql command which will be executed.
      Returns:
      returns a new QueryObject
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • get

      public static QueryObject get(Class<?> c)
      creates a new QueryObject for fluent API for selecting an object from the database
      Parameters:
      c - the Class of the to be selected object
      Returns:
      a new QueryObject
